item.description:
Open to all!

The College Hill Neighborhood Association is having their annual meeting and hosting a moderated debate among mayoral candidates for the City of Providence. With the September 14 primary, and election in November, now is a great time to gather more information about the candidates.

From the CHNA website:
Questions will be prepared prior to event. Providence residents are welcome to submit questions to us by August 20th for consideration.
Community Awards presented prior to panel discussion.
Refreshments provided by Blue State Coffee, Brown University and the Brown Faculty Club.


Regardless of your politics, come out, see the candidates and get ready for election season. Between this, the Governor's race and US Representative for District 1, it's a heady electoral autumn in Rhode Island.

The meeting and debate is scheduled from 6:30 to 8:30.
item.how_to_find_us: The event is in the Wheeler Auditorium, I'll hang out in the lobby with a sign.
item.name: Providence Mayoral Debate hosted by College Hill Neighborhood Association
